languages.text: "Полагаете?" {n}Инквизитор слегка улыбается, но без какого-либо намека на теплоту.{/n} "Я прекрасно осознаю, что делаю — я расставляю акценты в нашем общении. Напоминаю, что недреманное око {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g} следит за вами даже в вашей спальне. И не только око, но и чуткие руки Империума — в моем лице и лице моих помощников".

traits.locale_text: "Отнюдь, почтенн{mf|ый|ая} Лорд-капитан. Я прекрасно осознаю, что делаю — я расставляю акценты в нашем общении. Напоминаю, что недреманное око Империума следит за вами даже в вашей спальне. И не только око, но и чуткие руки Империума — в моем лице и лице моих помощников".

languages.text: "Is that what you think?" {n}The Inquisitor smiles slightly but without a shred of warmth.{/n} "I am fully aware of what I am doing — I am outlining our relationship. Need I remind you that the unsleeping eye of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} is watching you even in your bedchamber? And not just the eye, but the Imperium's sensitive hands as well — in this case, my assistants and I."
languages.original_text: "Полагаете?" {n}Инквизитор слегка улыбается, но без какого-либо намека на теплоту.{/n} "Я прекрасно осознаю, что делаю — я расставляю акценты в нашем общении. Напоминаю, что недреманное око {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g} следит за вами даже в вашей спальне. И не только око, но и чуткие руки Империума — в моем лице и лице моих помощников".

traits.locale_text: "Is that what you think?" {n}He smiles slightly but without a shred of warmth.{/n} "I am fully aware of what I am doing — I am outlining our relationship. Need I remind you that the unsleeping eye of the Imperium is watching you even in your bedchamber? And it's not just the eye, but the Imperium's sensitive hands as well — in this case, my assistants and I."

"Is that what you think?" {n}He smiles slightly but without a shred of warmth.{/n} "I am fully aware of what I am doing — I am outlining our relationship. Need I remind you that the unsleeping eye of the Imperium is watching you even in your bedchamber? And it's not just the eye, but the Imperium's sensitive hands as well — in this case, my assistants and I."

Need I remind you that the unsleeping eye of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} is watching you even in your bedchamber? And not just the eye, but the Imperium's sensitive hands as well — in this case, my assistants and I."

Need I remind you that the unsleeping eye of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} is watching you even in your bedchamber? And not just the eye, but the Imperium's sensitive hands as well — in this case, my assistants and I."

"Is that what you think?" {n}The Inquisitor smiles slightly but without a shred of warmth.{/n} "I am fully aware of what I am doing — I am outlining our relationship. Need I remind you that the unsleeping eye of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} is watching you even in your bedchamber? And not just the eye, but the Imperium's sensitive hands as well — in this case, my assistants and I."

languages.text: 「そうお思いか？」{n}異端審問官はうっすら笑みを浮かべるが、温かさの欠片もない。{/n}「己の行いははっきりと自覚してる。我々の関係を説明しているのだ。{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の眠らぬ目は寝室だろうと構わずこちらを見ていると、思い出させる必要が？目だけではない、帝国の鋭敏な手もまた同じこと。今回は、私の助手と私が務めている」
languages.original_text: "Is that what you think?" {n}The Inquisitor smiles slightly but without a shred of warmth.{/n} "I am fully aware of what I am doing — I am outlining our relationship. Need I remind you that the unsleeping eye of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} is watching you even in your bedchamber? And not just the eye, but the Imperium's sensitive hands as well — in this case, my assistants and I."

traits.locale_text: 「そうお思いか？」{n}異端審問官はうっすら笑みを浮かべるが、温かさの欠片もない。{/n}「己の行いははっきりと自覚してる。我々の関係を説明しているのだ。{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の眠らぬ目は寝室だろうと構わずこちらを見ていると、思い出させる必要が？目だけではない、帝国の鋭敏な手もまた同じこと。今回は、私の助手と私が務めている」

languages.original_text: "Is that what you think?" {n}The Inquisitor smiles slightly but without a shred of warmth.{/n} "I am fully aware of what I am doing — I am outlining our relationship. Need I remind you that the unsleeping eye of the Imperium is watching you even in your bedchamber? And not just the eye, but the Imperium's sensitive hands as well — in this case, my assistants and I."

languages.text: “你真是这样想的吗？”{n}大审判官露出了阴恻恻的笑容。{/n}“我很清楚我在做什么，我是在让你明白，我们之间的关系应该是什么样子的。难道还需要我来提醒你，即便你躺在自己的卧室里，{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}不眠不休的眼睛也依旧注视着你？不仅如此，帝国之手也悬在你的头上——我指的就是我和我的助手。”
languages.original_text: "Is that what you think?" {n}The Inquisitor smiles slightly but without a shred of warmth.{/n} "I am fully aware of what I am doing — I am outlining our relationship. Need I remind you that the unsleeping eye of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} is watching you even in your bedchamber? And not just the eye, but the Imperium's sensitive hands as well — in this case, my assistants and I."

traits.locale_text: “你真是这样想的吗？”{n}审判长露出了阴恻恻的笑容。{/n}“我很清楚我在做什么，我是在让你明白，我们之间的关系应该是什么样子的。难道还需要我来提醒你，即便你躺在自己的卧室里，{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}不眠不休的眼睛也依旧注视着你？不仅如此，帝国之手也悬在你的头上——我指的就是我和我的助手。”

languages.text: «¿Eso cree?». {n}El Inquisidor te sonríe sin el más mínimo ápice de calidez.{/n} «Soy plenamente consciente de lo que hago: delimitar nuestra relación. ¿Necesita que le recuerde que el ojo del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} nunca duerme y le vigila incluso en su alcoba? Y no solo el ojo, sino las manos del Imperium. En este caso, mis ayudantes y yo».
languages.original_text: "Is that what you think?" {n}The Inquisitor smiles slightly but without a shred of warmth.{/n} "I am fully aware of what I am doing — I am outlining our relationship. Need I remind you that the unsleeping eye of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} is watching you even in your bedchamber? And not just the eye, but the Imperium's sensitive hands as well — in this case, my assistants and I."

traits.locale_text: «¿Eso cree?». {n}El Inquisidor te sonríe sin el más mínimo ápice de calidez.{/n} «Soy plenamente consciente de lo que hago: delimitar nuestra relación. ¿Necesita que le recuerde que el ojo del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} nunca duerme y le vigila incluso en su alcoba? Y no solo el ojo, sino las manos del Imperium. En este caso, mis ayudantes y yo».

languages.text: « Est-ce là ce que vous croyez ? {n}rétorque l'inquisiteur avec un sourire glacial.{/n} Je suis parfaitement conscient de ce que je fais. Si je suis là, c'est pour établir les bases d'une relation. Dois-je vous rappeler que l'œil de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} qui ne dort jamais vous observe ici même, jusque dans vos quartiers ? Et pas seulement son œil, mais également ses mains, dans ce cas précis mes assistants et moi-même. Des mains que l'on pourrait qualifier de sensibles. »
languages.original_text: "Is that what you think?" {n}The Inquisitor smiles slightly but without a shred of warmth.{/n} "I am fully aware of what I am doing — I am outlining our relationship. Need I remind you that the unsleeping eye of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} is watching you even in your bedchamber? And not just the eye, but the Imperium's sensitive hands as well — in this case, my assistants and I."

traits.locale_text: « Est-ce là ce que vous croyez ? {n}rétorque l'inquisiteur avec un sourire glacial.{/n} Je suis parfaitement conscient de ce que je fais. Si je suis là, c'est pour établir les bases d'une relation. Dois-je vous rappeler que l'œil de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} qui ne dort jamais vous observe ici même, jusque dans vos quartiers ? Et pas seulement son œil, mais également ses mains, dans ce cas précis mes assistants et moi-même. Des mains que l'on pourrait qualifier de sensibles. »

languages.text: "Seht Ihr das so?" {n}Der Inquisitor lächelt, aber ohne jeden Hauch von Wärme.{/n} "Mir ist vollständig bewusst, was ich tue – ich zeige unser Verhältnis auf. Muss ich Euch daran erinnern, dass das Auge des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} niemals schläft und Euch auch in Eurer Schlafkammer beobachtet? Und nicht nur das Auge, sondern auch seine Hände – in diesem Fall meine Assistenten und ich."
languages.original_text: "Is that what you think?" {n}The Inquisitor smiles slightly but without a shred of warmth.{/n} "I am fully aware of what I am doing — I am outlining our relationship. Need I remind you that the unsleeping eye of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} is watching you even in your bedchamber? And not just the eye, but the Imperium's sensitive hands as well — in this case, my assistants and I."

traits.locale_text: "Seht Ihr das so?" {n}Der Inquisitor lächelt, aber ohne jeden Hauch von Wärme.{/n} "Mir ist vollständig bewusst, was ich tue – ich zeige unser Verhältnis auf. Muss ich Euch daran erinnern, dass das Auge des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} niemals schläft und Euch auch in Eurer Schlafkammer beobachtet? Und nicht nur das Auge, sondern auch seine Hände – in diesem Fall meine Assistenten und ich."

languages.text: "Öyle mi düşünüyorsun?" {n}Engizisyoncu, hafifçe ama içinde hiçbir sıcaklık ibaresi olmayan bir şekilde gülümsüyor.{/n} "Ben ne yaptığımın farkındayım, aramızdaki ilişkinin sınırlarını çiziyorum. {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk'un{/g} uyumak nedir bilmeyen gözlerinin seni yatak odanda bile izlediğini hatırlatmalı mıyım? Hatta yalnızca gözlerinin değil, ellerinin de. Bu durumda asistanlarımın ve benim ellerimin."
languages.original_text: "Is that what you think?" {n}The Inquisitor smiles slightly but without a shred of warmth.{/n} "I am fully aware of what I am doing — I am outlining our relationship. Need I remind you that the unsleeping eye of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} is watching you even in your bedchamber? And not just the eye, but the Imperium's sensitive hands as well — in this case, my assistants and I."

traits.locale_text: "Öyle mi düşünüyorsun?" {n}Engizisyoncu hafifçe ama içinde hiçbir sıcaklık ibaresi olmayan bir şekilde gülümsüyor.{/n} "Ben ne yaptığımın farkındayım; aramızdaki ilişkinin sınırlarını çiziyorum. {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g}'un uyumak nedir bilmeyen gözlerinin seni yatak odanda bile izlediğini hatırlatmak gerekli mi gerçekten? Yalnızca gözlerinin de değil, ellerinin de. Bu durumda asistanlarımın ve benim ellerimin."
